<Standard8> ddahl: try something like 'arch -i386 firefox -p'

comments.raw_text:
Running firefox the way you decribed on 10.5 enabled it to successfully launch the profile manager for me. Thanks!

Running it via 'arch -x86_64' crashes it as above. (iMac8,1)
